duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement, verify, and improve sanitation programs in accordance with regulatory, customer, company, and food safety standard systems requirements.
Verify cleaning activities and perform equipment/building cleaning verification after sanitation activities.
Take necessary measures when there is a deviation from policy and standards, including deciding to stop production activities if there is any food safety or quality critical deviation.
Alert appropriate personnel if employees are not following required programs and perform daily GMPs audits.
Work closely with maintenance for work orders implementation and follow up after audits.
Assist in the inspection of non-conforming products as needed and implement/update SSOP with departments as needed.
Translate departments' documentation in Spanish as needed and train sanitation personnel as needed.
Perform monthly review training for new employees and yearly quality/food safety refresher training, including supervising janitors' activities and organizing their schedule.
Follow and apply safety rules and comply with all company policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in dairy manufacturing or food science preferred. 3-5 years’ experience as a sanitation supervisor required.
